------
Hi, this is the dedicated page to show individual scenes of my SCP - 7179 fan animation. SCP - 7179 "E is for Eternity", written by Calibold was one of my most favorite horror article I have ever read on the site, the reason why the article hit my sweet spot is that I have been always attracted to the concept of infinity and how it can affect the tiny, simple mind of man,and 7179 is a great interpretation of that immortality's curse. The problem while making this piece was making one single illustration won't be able to visualize TIME - the huge aspect of this article, so I tried to animate it! It was a tedious process, but the final product looks decent enough compare my original plan, so I hope you enjoy the animation. More works to come!
